reviewText: The box came very beaten up. Looked like the video was 20 years old.

I enjoyed watching this movie, and very intriguing. Even though Belle or Dido was free, wealthy by her father's inheritance and in England, she still faced the hatred of racism by some in her nation. Thank the Lord we have come a long way and slavery is no more!
Absolutely wonderful film. If you love costume dramas, this is for you. If you love history and true stories based on history, this is for you. Gugu Mbatha-Raw is a jewel. Brilliant film.
